header.title: I'll help you develop practical management skills
header.description: Increase your productivity during daily work by accessing practical and unique knowledge that will help you transform the way you work every day.
header.podcast-apple: Skuteczny Plan - podcast on Apple Podcast
header.podcast-google: Skuteczny Plan - podcast na Google Podcast

quotes.description: My community is anyone who wants to increase their productivity and efficiency during daily work. They reach for this hard-to-access, practical and unique knowledge: creators, writers, programmers, marketers, agencies, software companies, communities, podcasters...

author.title: Meet,
author.description_1: Entrepreneur, mentor, social activist, law graduate, and active court mediator. A multiple-time scholarship recipient from the Torun School of Banking, University of Warmia-Mazury in Olsztyn, and from the President of the city of Olsztyn.
author.description_2: He has extensive experience in creating digital products and managing multidisciplinary teams, particularly understanding and leveraging the power of creativity and innovation within the diverse startup environment, successfully engaging in designing, executing and implementing innovative technological solutions. His portfolio includes over 500 successfully implemented IT projects. Honored with the Microsoft Poland award for an innovative project involving gamification on the Xbox 360 console. Winner of the I Warmia-Mazury programming competition organized by the University of Warmia-Mazury in Olsztyn.
author.description_3: A pioneer in the use of augmented reality technology in education and the retail industry. His ideas and solutions have been utilized by companies like: McDonald's, Nestle, Mattel, Nadec, Trefl, and Toyota. Awarded the prestigious Marek Drapiński Award for a project automating processes in remote teaching, which contributed to innovative and positive changes in the Polish academic environment.
author.description_4: An active participant in many national and international conferences and scientific seminars on new technologies (AR, VR, FinTech) and LegalTech, he is also the author of numerous publications and a valued speaker. In his private life, he is a golf enthusiast, and recently, a crossfit devotee.

slug.description: On a daily basis, I accompany companies and institutions in designing strategies and developing new products and services.

terms-of-use.title: Terms of Use
terms-of-use.description: The information posted on our website cannot be considered as advice on any matter. The contents provided on our website are for informational purposes only, and we do not assume any responsibility for any damages arising from their interpretation without consultation. All materials provided on our website are current as of the date of their publication. However, we cannot guarantee that they will be current or useful in every factual situation and at all times. Any content contained on our website may only be used for non-commercial private use. If you want to use them for public or commercial purposes, please contact us.

principles.title: Principles
principles.description: Principles [from Latin prīncipium, 'beginning, foundation']. A fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of beliefs, behavior, or reasoning chain.

metadata.content: Principles [from Latin prīncipium, 'beginning, foundation']. A fundamental truth or proposition that serves as the foundation for a system of beliefs, behaviors, or reasoning chain.

rules: Don't be the smartest person in the room.
Listening > talking.
Always demand a deadline.
Being enthusiastic is worth 25 IQ points.
Maintain high standards in everything you do.
Remember that what you don't know is more important than what you already know.
Strive to be the most successful version of yourself.
Don't forget to praise well-done work (but don't praise bad work).
Don't criticize anyone in front of others.
Say 'thank you'!
Dress as the person you want to be.
Stupid people double stupidity. Then triple.
Train your mind, gut (nutrition), and body. Lift weights.
Always give more than you take.
Explore and try new things (60/30-minute rule).
Surround yourself with the best (few) people. Reject those who don't make you better.
Encourage intellectual debate.
Make room for mistakes. Don't worry about being wrong.
Understand interdisciplinary learning.
Small details build a big picture. Think first principles.
Everything has been done before. The scenes change, but behaviors and results don't.
Understand the 80/20 rule.
Be an infinite learner. Reading (learning) is the ultimate meta-skill.
Knowledge is a complex interest of curiosity.
Your habits make you. Stick to simple rules.
Our lives are shaped by our minds; we become what we think.
Pursue what matters, not what's expedient.
Don't complain.
Don't let other people's expectations guide your actions.
Write down everything you want to achieve.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy

metadata.content: We attach the highest importance to confidentiality, and safeguarding the trade secrets and confidential information of our clients is a measure of our professionalism.

privacy-policy.description_1: We attach great importance to confidentiality and professionalism in safeguarding company secrets and our clients' confidential information. For this reason, our employees undergo appropriate training in this area, and modern technical means are used in the company to secure the confidential information entrusted to us.
privacy-policy.description_2: To begin with, we present a shortened version of the most important principles related to privacy protection:
description_3: By sending a message through the contact form or signing up for our newsletter, you provide us with your personal data. We ensure that your data remains confidential, secure and will not be disclosed to any third party without your express consent.
We entrust the processing of personal data only to verified and trusted entities that provide services related to the processing of personal data.

We use Google Analytics analytical tools that collect information about your visits to the site (which tabs you click on, how long you spend on the site, how you navigate between tabs). To this end, Google LLC cookies related to the Google Analytics service are used.
We use marketing tools such as Facebook Pixel to display personalized ads on Facebook. To this end, Facebook cookies are used.

We provide the option of using social features such as sharing content on social media pages. Using these features may require the use of cookies by social media page administrators such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Behance.
We use cookies to ensure the proper functioning of the website.
privacy-policy.description_4: If you want to learn more, keep reading.
privacy-policy.description_6: Skuteczny Plan is the administrator of your personal data within the meaning of personal data protection regulations. The purposes, legal bases, and period of personal data processing are indicated separately for each purpose of data processing.
privacy-policy.description_7: GDPR grants you the following rights related to the processing of your personal data:
description_8: the right to rectify personal data,
the right to access personal data,
the right to delete personal data,
the right to limit the processing of personal data,
the right to object to the processing of personal data,
the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority,
the right to withdraw consent to the processing of personal data, if you have previously given such consent.
privacy-policy.description_9: You can exercise the above rights in accordance with the principles described in Articles 16-21 of the GDPR by contacting us at the address kontakt{'@'}skutecznyplan.pl. The above email address can also be used for any questions related to the processing of your personal data.
privacy-policy.description_11: We guarantee the confidentiality of all personal data provided to us. We ensure the implementation of all necessary security measures and personal data protection required by the provisions of personal data protection laws. Personal data is collected with due diligence and properly protected against unauthorized access by third parties.
privacy-policy.description_13: Your data may be processed by our subcontractors, i.e. entities whose services we use in processing data and providing services or fulfilling orders on your behalf.
description_14: dhosting.pl - for data storage on a server, including a mailbox server,
Comarch ERPXT - for use of the invoicing system, in which your personal data is processed for the purpose of issuing an invoice,
individuals who, when providing technical support services for the Skuteczny Plan website, may potentially access your personal data.
privacy-policy.description_15: All entities to whom we entrust the processing of personal data guarantee the use of appropriate security and personal data protection measures required by law.

footer.legal-msg: The information on our website cannot be considered as advice in any matter. The content is for informational purposes only, and we are not responsible for any damages resulting from their interpretation without consultation. All materials available on our website are current as of the date of posting. However, we cannot guarantee that they will be current or useful in every factual situation and at all times. All content on our website may only be used for non-commercial private use. If you want to use them for public or commercial purposes, please contact us.

quotes.item_1: Leszek tries to explain everything in a very human way, definitely suitable as a lecturer.
quotes.item_2: I must admit that listening to you that day, I felt a surge of motivation to do things outside of work.
quotes.item_3: Leszek touches on topics that are not only related to entrepreneurship and business, but also have to do with everyday life.
quotes.item_4: A substantive, inspiring, and developing podcast. Thank you for all the episodes! You're doing an amazing job.
quotes.item_5: The podcast gives a lot of courage for daily action. Leszek develops and helps to step out of the comfort zone, allowing us to think and look more broadly.
quotes.item_6: Leszek is very pleasant and gentle to listen to. The podcast is definitely directed to ordinary people, without pompous words.

epizode_1.title: Simple Way to Boost Productivity
epizode_1.description: How will Ivy Lee's method increase your productivity? A simple way to be productive. Try a method that is based on very simple principles.

epizode_2.title: My Perspective on Self-Improvement
epizode_2.description: Small steps that are the essence of the Kaizen philosophy, known as the method of continuous process improvement. According to psychology, self-improvement is the pursuit of personal development in various areas.

epizode_3.title: Start Controlling Your Risks
epizode_3.description: Consider whether, when preparing for a new venture, you have taken a moment to think if you or your company are adequately prepared for it.

epizode_4.title: When Tasks Start Overwhelming You?
epizode_4.description: There is talk of morning larks or night owls - a certain dependence on our individual rhythm of activity in which our body feels more productive. But is it really so...

epizode_5.title: The 2-Minute Rule: Effective Time Management
epizode_5.description: We have all experienced a state of overwhelm. Even the most organized individuals sometimes postpone some of their tasks. How to deal with it?

epizode_6.title: Matrix of Priorities and Time Management
epizode_6.description: None of us likes to find ourselves in a situation for which we were not previously prepared. When additional tasks come pouring in, demanding our attention, and we start losing control. Tasks begin to manage us, but it should be the other way around. What to do to have more time for important things and manage the chaos?

epizode_7.title: The Technique for Effective Progress
epizode_7.description: We all have goals, but what to do when their implementation is going poorly, and we stop seeing progress? The technique you will learn in today's episode guarantees clear guidelines on how to overcome your own stagnation.

epizode_8.title: It's Not About the Goal
epizode_8.description: We live in a world obsessed with fast work and achieving results. What significance do weeks, months, and years have when the target keeps changing? In today's episode, we will examine what truly matters and determines our actions.
